notifications.linkText: See the full list of changes since 8.0.0
notifications.body:
Vaadin Framework 8.0.3 is now available.

The release contains several bugfixes and documentation improvements. The release also contain a major Grid performance optimisation. There are in total 90 changes landed since the 8.0.0 and some changes contain multiple improvements. Some of the changes were fixes cherry picked from the older 7.7 branch.

Using the latest bugfix version is suggested for all Framework 8 users.
notifications.title: Vaadin Framework 8.0.3 released

notifications.body: Subscribe to the new Vaadin Prime package and get access to all online trainings for your entire team and save thousands during your first year!
notifications.title: Buy Prime before May, get trainings for free!

notifications.linkText: See the full list of changes since 8.0.0
notifications.body:
Vaadin Framework 8.0.2 is now available.

The release contains several bugfixes and documentation improvements. There are in total 44 changes landed since the 8.0.0 and some changes contain multiple improvements. Some of the changes were fixes cherry picked from the older 7.7 branch.

Using the latest bugfix version is suggested for all Framework 8 users.
notifications.title: Vaadin Framework 8.0.2 released

notifications.body:
Vaadin Framework 8 is now declared as stable.

The version 8 is a first major release in years. Databinding APIs are completely revamped, several component settings have better defaults and we have dropped support for some legacy technologies.

Read the release blog and release notes for more details!
notifications.title: Vaadin Framework 8.0.0 released

notifications.body:
Want to have a Vaadin presentation at your local event? We've received really good feedback and are happy to join you and your group as well – let's schedule it together!

Contact Vaadin Advocate Ville Ingman at ville@vaadin.com for more info.
notifications.title: Speech at your meetup or company?
